Function.Name: HasComplianceRuleNoResolve()
Function.Expression: from AttestationCase select current if(getObjectKeyTable(ObjectKey1) = "Person" or getObjectKeyTable(ObjectKey3) = "Person")then( if(getObjectKeyTable(ObjectKeyBase) in ("PersonInDepartment","PersonInProfitCenter","PersonInLocality","PersonInAERole","PersonHasEset"))then Exists("ComplianceRule", format("IsExceptionAllowed = 0 and uid_compliancerule in (select uid_compliancerule from CPL_VCCSPersonCheckDetail where uid_person ='{0}' and objectkeyelement = '{1}')",GetUIDFromObjectKey(ObjectKey1),ObjectKey2)) else if(not(isnullOrEmpty(ObjectKey3)))then Exists("ComplianceRule", format("EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM UNSAccountInUNSGroup where XObjectKey = '{2}') and IsExceptionAllowed = 0 and uid_compliancerule in (select uid_compliancerule from CPL_VCCSPersonCheckDetail where uid_person ='{0}' and objectkeyelement = '{1}')",GetUIDFromObjectKey(ObjectKey3),ObjectKey1,ObjectKeyBase)) )
